$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Brother...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Your brother lies dead... Your family's
blood—my blood—has been spilled...$k$pAnd the one who killed your brother
will be arriving soon.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|I wonder... How will you kill Alfonse?
Will you use my power...or will I be
the one using you? Hmm...$k$pWell? Which would you prefer?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|I fear no human. After all, do you
fear the worms beneath your feet?$k$p$Sbs1000|
